alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Back (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 29 at 12:21AM MST until January 29 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Widespread total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches, with locally higher amounts of 5 to 9 inches possible in portions of the Ogden Valley including Liberty, Eden, and Huntsville. * WHERE...Wasatch Back. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
